Text.NoClass: The class you selected does not exist. Contact a GM for assistance.
Text.ToManyCharacters: You cannot make anymore then {0} Characters.
Text.CharacterNameExists: A Character with this name already exists.
Text.WarriorsDes: Warriors are a class of great strength and vitality. They are not easily killed in battle and have the advantage of being able to use a variety of heavy weapons and Armour. Therefore, Warriors favor attacks that are based on melee physical damage. They are weak in ranged attacks, however the variety of equipment that are developed specifically for Warriors complement their weakness in ranged combat.
Text.WizardDes: Wizards are a class of low strength and stamina, but have the ability to use powerful spells. Their offensive spells are very effective, but because it takes time to cast these spells, they're likely to leave themselves open for enemy's attacks. Therefore, the physically weak wizards must aim to attack their enemies from a safe distance.
Text.TaoistDes: Taoists are well disciplined in the study of Astronomy, Medicine, and others aside from Mu-Gong. Rather then directly engaging the enemies, their specialty lies in assisting their allies with support. Taoists can summon powerful creatures and have a high resistance to magic, and is a class with well balanced offensive and defensive abilities.
Text.AssassinDes: Assassins are members of a secret organization and their history is relatively unknown. They're capable of hiding themselves and performing attacks while being unseen by others, which naturally makes them excellent at making fast kills. It is necessary for them to avoid being in battles with multiple enemies due to their weak vitality and strength.
Text.ArcherDes: Archers are a class of great accuracy and strength, using their powerful skills with bows to deal extraordinary damage from range. Much like wizards, they rely on their keen instincts to dodge oncoming attacks as they tend to leave themselves open to frontal attacks. However, their physical prowess and deadly aim allows them to instil fear into anyone they hit.

Text.HalfMoonSkillDescription:
Half Moon

Toggle Skill
Mana Cost: {2} per attack

Cause damage to enemies in a semi circle around the caster with
the shock waves from your fast moving weapon.

Current Skill Level {0}
Next Level {1}
Text.CrossHalfMoonSkillDescription:
Cross Half-Moon

Toggle Skill
Mana Cost: {2} per attack

A warrior uses two powerful waves of Half Moon
to inflict damage on all mobs stood next to them.

Current Skill Level {0}
Next Level {1}
Text.FatalSwordPassiveSkillDescription:
Fatal Sword

Passive Skill

Increase attack damage on the monsters.
also increases accuracy a little.
Passive Skill

Current Skill Level {0}
Next Level {1}

Text.ConsignmentRules:
1. Consignment is {0} gold per item 

2. 1% of sale price is paid to Trust Merchant at sale end

3. Maximum {1} days of item sale registration until item is removed

4. Maximum of unlimited items allowed for sale

5. Sale price can be set between: {2} - {3} gold
Text.AuctionRules:
1. Auction cost is {0} gold, max starting bid is {1} gold per item 

2. 1% of final bid price is paid to Trust Merchant at auction end

3. Maximum {2} days of item sale registration, afterwards the item will be sent to highest bidder

4. Maximum of unlimited items allowed for auction
